text:
<@U6088UMEZ> *Whilst we'll be formally wrapping up our E-Mentoring programme this Friday*, if you & your E-Mentor both want to carry on the conversation, you can! Simply ask to connect with them on LinkedIn or for their contact details :the_horns::the_horns::the_horns:

Thanks again for being part of our pilot so far! We know it has been short & sweet, but we've learned a lot and hope to be running lengthier programmes post-Summer.

>It's recommended that you still make the most of your E-Mentors whilst they are fully committed, in case they can no longer be involved beyond this Friday. :got_to_run::got_to_run::got_to_run:
